COMMIT.MESSAGE: [CI] Unmute RollingUpgradeSearchableSnapshotIndexCompatibilityIT tests Mixed cluster tests failed because a serialization change wasn't backported during a couple of days (#119832). Now the change is backported, we can reenable those tests. Closes #119990 Closes #119989 Closes #119980 Closes #119979 Closes #119978
